feed.subtitle: A personal website for Shansita Das Sharma

entry.title: machine learning papers in 10 minutes
entry.content: I used to make YouTube tutorials for iOS app development back in high school. Recently, I was explaining the workings of an LLM to my non-tech friend while debating the who-to-trust-less race between Wikipedia and LLMs, and I realized that it’s really fun to break down ML topics. I went ahead and looked back at my old youtube channel and decided to start a series of explaining the key ideas behind research papers I find interesting during my literature reviews, all in videos under 10 minutes long. I figured, if anything, it’ll be practice for me to articulate complex ideas!
entry.summary: explaining ML research papers I've liked reading
